summary.para: Describes the subresources from a 3D texture to use in a render-target view.

remarks.para: Use this structure with a structure to view the resource as a 3D texture.

summary.para: The index of the mipmap level to use mip slice.
Number of depth levels to use in the render-target view, starting from FirstWSlice. A value of -1 indicates all of the slices along the w axis, starting from FirstWSlice.
